00050 /* ----------------------------- PUBLIC MACROS ------------------------------ */
00051 
00052 /* Options of the pocket finder program */
00053 /* standard parameters */
00054 
00055 
00056 #define M_MIN_ASHAPE_SIZE_DEFAULT 3.0/**< Use min alpha sphere radius of : 3.0 */
00057 
00058 #define M_MAX_ASHAPE_SIZE_DEFAULT 6.0/**< Use max alpha sphere radius of : 6.0 */
00059 
00060 #define M_CLUST_MAX_DIST 1.73/**< Use first connection distance (see report) : 2.0 */
00061 
00062 #define M_REFINE_DIST 4.5/**< use second connection distance (see report) : 4.5 */
00063 
00064 #define M_REFINE_MIN_PROP_APOL_AS 0.0/**< At least a proportion of  M_REFINE_MIN_NAPOL_AS apolar alpha spheres in the pocket 0.0 */
00065 
00066 #define M_SLCLUST_MAX_DIST 2.5/**< Single linkage clustering connection distance 2.5 */
00067 
00068 #define M_SLCLUST_MIN_NUM_NEIGH 2/**< Minimum number of common neighbours for single linkage clustering 5 */
00069 
00070 #define M_MC_ITER 3000/**< Number of iterations for the Monte Carlo volume calculation 3000 */
00071 
00072 #define M_BASIC_VOL_DIVISION -1/**< Precision for "exact" volume integration, set to -1 if not used -1 */
00073 
00074 #define M_MIN_POCK_NB_ASPH 36/**< Minimum number of alpha spheres for a pocket to be kept */
00075 
00076 #define M__MIN_APOL_NEIGH_DEFAULT 3/**< Minimum number of atoms having a low electronegativity in order to declare
00077  an alpha sphere to be apolar 3 */
00078 
00079 
00080 #define M_PAR_PDB_FILE 'f' /**< flag to give a single pdb input file*/
00081 #define M_PAR_PDB_LIST 'F' /**< flag to give a txt file containing paths to multiple pdb files*/
00082 #define M_PAR_MAX_ASHAPE_SIZE 'M' /**< flag for the maximum alpha sphere size*/
00083 #define M_PAR_MIN_ASHAPE_SIZE 'm' /**< flag for the minimum alpha sphere size*/
00084 #define M_PAR_MIN_APOL_NEIGH 'A' /**< flag for the minimum number of apolar neighbours for an alpha sphere to be considered as apolar*/
00085 #define M_PAR_CLUST_MAX_DIST 'D' /**< flag for the first clustering distance*/
00086 #define M_PAR_SL_MAX_DIST 's' /**< flag for the distance crit. of the multiple linkage clustering algorithm*/
00087 #define M_PAR_SL_MIN_NUM_NEIGH 'n' /**< flag for the single linkage min neighbours*/
00088 #define M_PAR_MC_ITER 'v' /**< flag for how many iterations for the monte carlo volume calculation algorithm*/
00089 #define M_PAR_BASIC_VOL_DIVISION 'b' /**< flag for the space approximation of the MC*/
00090 #define M_PAR_MIN_POCK_NB_ASPH 'i' /**< flag for the min number of alpha spheres in the pocket*/
00091 #define M_PAR_REFINE_DIST 'r' /**< flag for the refining distance*/
00092 #define M_PAR_REFINE_MIN_NAPOL_AS 'p'/**< flag for minimum proportion of apolar alpha spheres*/
00093 
00094 #define M_FP_USAGE "\n\
00095 ***** USAGE (fpocket) *****\n\
00096 \n\
00097 Pocket finding on a pdb - list of pdb - file(s):             \n\
00098 \t./bin/fpocket -f pdb                                       \n\
00099 \t./bin/fpocket -F pdb_list                                  \n\
00100 \nOPTIONS (find standard parameters in brackets)           \n\n\
00101 \t-m (float)  : Minimum radius of an alpha-sphere.      (3.0)\n\
00102 \t-M (float)  : Maximum radius of an alpha-sphere.      (6.0)\n\
00103 \t-A (int)    : Minimum number of apolar neighbor for        \n\
00104 \t              an a-sphere to be considered as apolar.   (3)\n\
00105 \t-i (int)    : Minimum number of a-sphere per pocket.   (30)\n\
00106 \t-D (float)  : Maximum distance for first clustering        \n\
00107 \t              algorithm.                             (1.73)\n\
00108 \t-s (float)  : Maximum distance for single linkage          \n\
00109 \t              clustering                              (2.5)\n\
00110 \t-n (integer): Minimum number of neighbor close from        \n\
00111 \t              each other (not merged otherwise).        (3)\n\
00112 \t-r (float)  : Maximum distance between two pockets         \n\
00113 \t              barycenter (merged otherwise).          (4.5)\n\
00114 \t-p (float)  : Minimum proportion of apolar sphere in       \n\
00115 \t              a pocket (remove otherwise)             (0.0)\n\
00116 \t-v (integer): Number of Monte-Carlo iteration for the      \n\
00117 \t              calculation of each pocket volume.     (2500)\n\
00118 \t-b (integer): Space approximation for the basic method     \n\
00119 \t              of the volume calculation. Not used by       \n\
00120 \t              default (Monte Carlo approximation is)       \n\
00121 \nSee the manual (man fpocket), or the full documentation for\n\
00122 more information.\n\
00123 ***************************\n" /**< the usage print content*/
00124 
00125 /* --------------------------- PUBLIC STRUCTURES ---------------------------- */
00126 /**
00127         Structure containing all necessary parameters that can be changed by the user.
00128         This structure is commun to both programs (validation and pocket finding), 
00129         even if the pocked finding programm doesn't need some parameters.
00130 */
00131 typedef struct s_fparams
00132 {
00133         char pdb_path[M_MAX_PDB_NAME_LEN] ;     /**< The pdb file */
00134         char **pdb_lst ;
00135         int npdb ;      /**< number of pdb files*/
00136         
00137         int min_apol_neigh,              /**< Min number of apolar neighbours for an a-sphere
00138                                                                 to be an apolar a-sphere */
00139                 sl_clust_min_nneigh, /**< Min number of neighbours for single linkage
00140                                                                 clustering */
00141                 nb_mcv_iter,             /**< Number of iteration for the Monte Carlo volume
00142                                                                 calculation */
00143                 basic_volume_div,        /**< Box division factor for basic volume calculation */
00144                 min_pock_nb_asph ;       /**< Minimump number of alpha spheres per pocket */
00145 
00146         float clust_max_dist,                                   /**< First clustering distance criteria */
00147                   refine_min_apolar_asphere_prop,       /**< Min proportion of apolar alpha
00148                                                                                         spheres for each pocket */
00149                   sl_clust_max_dist,    /**< Single linkage clusturing distance criteria */
00150                   refine_clust_dist,    /**< Refine clustering distance criteria */
00151                   asph_min_size,                /**< Minimum size of alpha spheres to keep */
00152                   asph_max_size ;               /**< Maximum size of alpha spheres to keep */
00153 
00154 
00155 } s_fparams ;
00156

00170 int parse_refine_dist(char *str, s_fparams *p)  ;
00171 int parse_refine_minaap(char *str, s_fparams *p)  ;
